word_mean: 心律失常的，心律不齐的，无节律的

sentence.Network_en: Conclusion: Rhodiola has favorable anti - ventricular arrhythmia effects on arrhythmic animal models.
sentence.Network_cn: 结论: 大花红景天水提液对多种实验性快速室性心律失常有良好的防治作用.

sentence.Network_en: The present study demonstrates that sudden arrhythmic death is an important contributor to SIDS.
sentence.Network_cn: 本研究指出,突然的心律失常性死亡在SIDS中占很重要的地位.

sentence.Network_en: Conclusion Shensongyangxin capsule can block Ik 1, Ito and Ik, which may contribute to its anti - arrhythmic effect.
sentence.Network_cn: 结论参松养心胶囊干粉提取溶液对IK1, Ito和Ik均具有不同程度的阻滞作用.
